    • 方法详细资料

      • read

        public byte[] read(long chunkID,
          long offset,
          int size)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        Read semantics.
        指定者:
        read 在接口中 SDSlaveService
        参数:
        chunkID - target chunkID.
        offset - offset of target chunk.
        size - read requirement size.
        返回:
        required data.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throws when cannot read.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when RMI service fail.

      • write

        public boolean write(long chunkID,
            long offset,
            int size,
            byte[] data)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
        Write semantics
        指定者:
        write 在接口中 SDSlaveService
        参数:
        chunkID - target chunkID.
        offset - offset of target chunk.
        size - write data size.
        data - data to be written.
        返回:
        if write success.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throws when cannot write.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when RMI service fail.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(long chunkID)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Delete semantics.
        指定者:
        delete 在接口中 SDSlaveService
        参数:
        chunkID - target chunkID.
        返回:
        if complete.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when RMI service fail.

      • append

        public boolean append(long chunkID,
             int size,
             byte[] data)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Append sematics. This operation is special in dfs, used to add a new chunk.
        指定者:
        append 在接口中 SDSlaveService
        参数:
        chunkID - target chunkID.
        size - append data size.
        data - data to be append.
        返回:
        if success.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when RMI service fail.
